instructions.name: collect_fund_fee
docs: Collect the fund fee accrued to the pool
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `amount_0_requested` - The maximum amount of token_0 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_1
* `amount_1_requested` - The maximum amount of token_1 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_0

accounts.name: owner
docs: Only admin or fund_owner can collect fee now

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Pool state stores accumulated protocol fee amount

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Amm config account stores fund_owner

docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_0

accounts.name: token_1_vault
docs: The address that holds pool tokens for token_1

docs: The mint of token_0 vault

accounts.name: vault_1_mint
docs: The mint of token_1 vault

accounts.name: recipient_token_0_account
docs: The address that receives the collected token_0 fund fees

accounts.name: recipient_token_1_account
docs: The address that receives the collected token_1 fund fees

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The SPL program to perform token transfers

accounts.name: token_program_2022
docs: The SPL program 2022 to perform token transfers

instructions.name: collect_protocol_fee

* `ctx` - The context of accounts
* `amount_0_requested` - The maximum amount of token_0 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_1
* `amount_1_requested` - The maximum amount of token_1 to send, can be 0 to collect fees in only token_0

docs: Only admin or owner can collect fee now

docs: Pool state stores accumulated protocol fee amount

instructions.name: create_amm_config
docs: # Arguments
* `ctx`- The accounts needed by instruction.
* `index` - The index of amm config, there may be multiple config.
* `trade_fee_rate` - Trade fee rate, can be changed.
* `protocol_fee_rate` - The rate of protocol fee within tarde fee.
* `fund_fee_rate` - The rate of fund fee within tarde fee.

accounts.name: owner
docs: Address to be set as protocol owner.

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Initialize AmmConfig state account to store protocol owner address and fee rates

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Creates a pool for the given token pair and the initial price
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `lp_token_amount` - Pool token amount to transfer. token_a and token_b amount are set by the current exchange rate and size of the pool
* `maximum_token_0_amount` -  Maximum token 0 amount to deposit, prevents excessive slippage
* `maximum_token_1_amount` - Maximum token 1 amount to deposit, prevents excessive slippage

accounts.name: owner
docs: Pays to mint the position

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Pool state the owner is depositing into

accounts.name: token_0_account
docs: The payer's token account to deposit token_0

accounts.name: token_1_account
docs: The payer's token account to deposit token_1

accounts.name: token_0_vault
docs: Pool vault for token_0 to deposit into
The address that holds pool tokens for token_0

accounts.name: token_1_vault
docs: Pool vault for token_1 to deposit into
The address that holds pool tokens for token_1

accounts.name: token_program
docs: token Program

accounts.name: token_program_2022
docs: Token program 2022

accounts.name: vault_0_mint
docs: The mint of token_0 vault

accounts.name: vault_1_mint
docs: The mint of token_1 vault

accounts.name: system_program
docs: To create a new program account

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Creates a pool for the given token pair and the initial price
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `init_amount_0` - the initial amount_0 to deposit
* `init_amount_1` - the initial amount_1 to deposit
* `open_time` - the timestamp allowed for swap

accounts.name: creator
docs: Address paying to create the pool. It can be anyone.

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Which amm config the pool belongs to

accounts.name: authority
docs: sign transactions on behalf of the pool
for vault and lp_mint

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Initialize an account to store the pool state

accounts.name: token_0_mint
docs: Token_0 mint, the key must smaller than token_1 mint.

accounts.name: token_1_mint
docs: Token_1 mint, the key must greater than token_0 mint.

accounts.name: creator_token_0
docs: creator token 0 account

accounts.name: creator_token_1
docs: creator token 1 account

accounts.name: create_pool_fee
docs: create pool fee account

accounts.name: observation_state
docs: an account to store oracle observations

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Program to create mint account and mint tokens

accounts.name: token_0_program
docs: Spl token program or token program 2022

accounts.name: token_1_program
docs: Spl token program or token program 2022

accounts.name: associated_token_program
docs: Program to create an ATA for receiving position NFT

accounts.name: system_program
docs: To create a new program account

accounts.name: rent
docs: Sysvar for program account

instructions.name: swap_base_input
docs: Swap the tokens in the pool base input amount
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `amount_in` -  input amount to transfer, output to DESTINATION is based on the exchange rate
* `minimum_amount_out` -  Minimum amount of output token, prevents excessive slippage

accounts.name: payer
docs: The user performing the swap

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: The factory state to read protocol fees

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: The program account of the pool in which the swap will be performed

accounts.name: input_token_account
docs: The user token account for input token

accounts.name: output_token_account
docs: The user token account for output token

accounts.name: input_vault
docs: The vault token account for input token

accounts.name: output_vault
docs: The vault token account for output token

accounts.name: input_token_program
docs: SPL program for input token transfers

accounts.name: output_token_program
docs: SPL program for output token transfers

accounts.name: input_token_mint
docs: The mint of input token

accounts.name: output_token_mint
docs: The mint of output token

accounts.name: observation_state
docs: The program account for the most recent oracle observation

instructions.name: swap_base_output
docs: Swap the tokens in the pool base output amount
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `max_amount_in` -  input amount prevents excessive slippage
* `amount_out` -  amount of output token

instructions.name: update_amm_config
docs: Updates the owner of the amm config
Must be called by the current owner or admin
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `trade_fee_rate`- The new trade fee rate of amm config, be set when `param` is 0
* `protocol_fee_rate`- The new protocol fee rate of amm config, be set when `param` is 1
* `fund_fee_rate`- The new fund fee rate of amm config, be set when `param` is 2
* `new_owner`- The config's new owner, be set when `param` is 3
* `new_fund_owner`- The config's new fund owner, be set when `param` is 4
* `param`- The vaule can be 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4, otherwise will report a error

accounts.name: owner
docs: The amm config owner or admin

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: The amm config account to update

instructions.name: update_pool_status
docs: Update pool status for given vaule
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `status` - The vaule of status

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw lp for token0 ande token1
# Arguments
* `ctx`- The context of accounts
* `lp_token_amount` - Amount of pool tokens to burn. User receives an output of token a and b based on the percentage of the pool tokens that are returned.
* `minimum_token_0_amount` -  Minimum amount of token 0 to receive, prevents excessive slippage
* `minimum_token_1_amount` -  Minimum amount of token 1 to receive, prevents excessive slippage

fields.name: index
docs: Config index

fields.name: trade_fee_rate
docs: The trade fee, denominated in hundredths of bip (10^-6)

fields.name: protocol_fee_rate
docs: The protocol fee

fields.name: fund_fee_rate
docs: The fund fee, denominated in hundredths of bip (10^-6)

fields.name: create_pool_fee
docs: Fee for creating a new pool

fields.name: protocol_owner
docs: Address of the protocol fee owner

fields.name: fund_owner
docs: Address of the fund fee owner

fields.name: padding
docs: padding

types.name: LpChangeEvent
docs: Emitted when deposit or withdraw

types.name: Observation
docs: The element of observations in ObservationState

fields.name: block_timestamp
docs: The block timestamp of the observation

fields.name: cumulative_token_0_price_x32
docs: The cumulative of token0 price during the duration time, Q32.32, the remaining 64 bit for overflow

fields.name: cumulative_token_1_price_x32
docs: The cumulative of token1 price during the duration time, Q32.32, the remaining 64 bit for overflow

fields.name: initialized
docs: Whether the ObservationState is enabled

fields.name: observation_index
docs: The most recently updated index of the observations array

fields.name: observations
docs: observation array

fields.name: padding
docs: padding

fields.name: amm_config
docs: To which AmmConfig the pool belongs to

fields.name: pool_creator
docs: Pool Creator

fields.name: token_0_vault
docs: Vault to store Token A of the pool

fields.name: token_1_vault
docs: Vault to store Token B of the pool

fields.name: _padding1
docs: Pool tokens are issued when Token A or Token B are deposited
Pool tokens can be withdrawn back to the original Token A or Token B

fields.name: token_0_mint
docs: Mint info of Token A

fields.name: token_1_mint
docs: Mint info of Token B

fields.name: token_0_program
docs: token_0 program

fields.name: token_1_program
docs: token_1_program

fields.name: observation_key
docs: Observation account to store the oracle data

fields.name: status
docs: Bitwise represenation of the state of the pool
Bit0: 1 - Disable Deposit(value will be 1), 0 - Deposit can be done(normal)
Bit1: 1 - Disable Withdraw(value will be 2), 0 - Withdraw can be done(normal)
Bit2: 1 - Disable Swap(value will be 4), 0 - Swap can be done(normal)

fields.name: _padding2
docs: lp_mint decimals

fields.name: mint_0_decimals
docs: mint0 and mint1 decimals

fields.name: lp_supply
docs: True circulating supply of lp_mint tokens without burns and lock-ups

fields.name: protocol_fees_token_0
docs: The amount of token_0 and token_1 owed to Liquidity Provider

fields.name: open_time
docs: The timestamp allowed for swap in the pool

fields.name: recent_epoch
docs: recent epoch

fields.name: cumulative_trade_fees_token_0
docs: Trade fees of token_0 after every swap

fields.name: cumulative_trade_fees_token_1
docs: Trade fees of token_1 after every swap

fields.name: cumulative_volume_token_0
docs: Cummulative volume of token_0

fields.name: cumulative_volume_token_1
docs: Cummulative volume of token_1

fields.name: filter_period
docs: Filter period determine high frequency trading time window.

fields.name: decay_period
docs: Decay period determine when the volatile fee start decay / decrease.

fields.name: reduction_factor
docs: Reduction factor controls the volatile fee rate decrement rate.

fields.name: variable_fee_control
docs: Used to scale the variable fee component depending on the dynamic of the market

fields.name: padding
docs: padding

errors:.name: InvalidOwner
errors:.msg: Input account owner is not the program address

errors:.name: IncorrectLpMint
errors:.msg: Address of the provided lp token mint is incorrect

errors:.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors:.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors:.name: InitLpAmountTooLess
errors:.msg: Init lp amount is too less(Because 100 amount lp will be locked)
